document.full_text: russia's foreign ministry said on sunday that nato could be targeting leader muammar gaddafi and his family, after libyan officials said his youngest son and three grandchildren were killed in an air strike.
document.title: russia says nato may be targeting gaddafi
lines_and_colors: russia's foreign ministry said on sunday that nato could be targeting leader muammar gaddafi and his family, after libyan officials said his youngest son and three grandchildren were killed in an air strike.
